Mrs.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: used before a married woman’s family name to be polite when you are speaking to her, writing to her, or talking about her
Mrs.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Mrs Meddeman heads the fundraising committee.
Mrs.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a title used before a married woman’s family name when being polite
Mrs.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: Mrs Bell is out of the office at the moment.
